overview: The work deals with the story of the couple Hassan and Samia, who live happily, and disturbed their lives only some of the harassment of the mother of Samia to Hassan, until the situation changes when they give birth to their child (Hani), to use her mother Samia to care for the young and live with them at home and events escalate.

production_companies.name: المؤسسة المصرية العامة للسينما والتلفزيون (والمسرح والموسيقى)

title: Good Morning My Dear Wife
